title: Spacious, High Ceilings, Immediate Move In Ready 1 Bed, 1Bed Live/Work
map_address: 3909 San Fernando Rd near Central Ave
posting_body: Use this link for more details:
Welcome Home to The Link Apartment Homes
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 1350 Sq.
Never leave home to work again at The Link Glendale!
Our live/work suites offer spacious one-story floor plans.
It is 1350 square feet and located in the City of Glendale is perfect for a small business such as yoga classes, seminars, eye lash studio, massage therapy, make-up artist and so much more!

Our vibrant live/work apartments feature quartz countertops, combined concrete and wood style flooring, included washers and dryers, full kitchen with stainless-steel appliances and in unit 1/2 customer bathroom.
These apartments have an ideal storefront entrance with easy access from San Fernando Road along with retail parking space in our ground parking.
*Essential Housing Program, Income Restrictions Apply to Select Units
From 210 West & 134 West, continue on to the CA- 2 South (Glendale Freeway) to Exit on San Fernando Road.
Make a right off the freeway, The Link is on the left hand side.
From the 110 West/ 5 South Freeway, continue on until Exit Glendale Blvd, turn right on Glendale Blvd, turn Left on San Fernando Road, The Link is on the left hand side.
Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.
AMC-CA, Inc. dba Apartment Management Consultants-BRE #01525033
